title: pagasEya thagunA
sahitya:
pagasEya tagunA iTu pagasEya tagunA nAyeDanitu paramAtma shrI rAmacandra

anupallavi

 pagavAni tammuni digulu dIrcitivani agaNitamagu kIrti jagatini galigina

caraNam

 aparAdhiyagu nAdu nepamulanu dalaci krpajUDakanu EmO viparItamani enci 
rAmacandrapura vara shrI vEnkaTaramaNa bhAgavata satuDaina nAyeDa
